mapper.select: select p.id planId,p.title,p.content,p.feature,p.price,p.plan_type from cell_plan p where p.cell_id=#{cellId}

select b.id brandId,b.brand_name brand,b.avator,c.cover preview,c.title,p.price,c.id,ifnull(b.blue_end_at > now(),0) enableBlue from cell c inner join brand b on c.brand_id = b.id inner join cell_plan p on c.id = p.cell_id
1=1 AND c.mark = '2' AND p.plan_type = 'bird'
AND (locate(#{dto.q}, b.brand_name)>0 or locate(#{dto.q}, c.title)>0)
AND p.price >= #{dto.budgetMin}
AND p.price <= #{dto.budgetMax}
Order by c.create_At desc
Order by p.price desc
Order by p.price asc
